testCases.query: Create an HTML presentation for my conference talk about building real-time collaborative editors
expectedBehavior: Claude runs Phase 1 content discovery: asks purpose, slide count, and content readiness via AskUserQuestion
Runs Phase 2 style discovery: asks for mood/vibe selection, generates 3 style preview HTML files in .claude-design/slide-previews/
Generates a single self-contained HTML file with inline CSS and JS, no external dependencies
Every slide uses height: 100vh with overflow: hidden (viewport fitting)
Includes SlidePresentation class with keyboard, touch, and scroll navigation
Opens the final HTML file in the browser

testCases.query: Convert my existing quarterly-review.pptx file into a web presentation
expectedBehavior: Claude detects Mode B (PPT Conversion) from the .pptx file reference
Follows the PPTX conversion reference workflow to extract content
Proceeds to Phase 2 for style selection after extraction
Generates a self-contained HTML file preserving the original slide content
Creates an assets/ directory for any extracted images

testCases.query: Write unit tests for the UserService class in our Node.js backend
expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke the presentation-builder skill
Uses standard testing patterns (Jest, Vitest, etc.) instead
No HTML file generation, style previews, or slide-related output
